reviewText: One of the most under-rated films out there, "The Deadbeat Club" is a definite "Must Have" for any DVD enthusiast to keep in their collection for those days when your faith in the human race needs a little bit of a boost. Based on a true story, it's an awesome and life affirming piece that's head and shoulders above most of what's passing for movies from the larger studios these days--and at a fraction of the budget! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

Thank goodness the names were changed to protect...the innocent?  Probably not....but I'm sure they are glad their names were changed!  I know this is supposed to be fiction, but was told it was also based on some real events that happened in a small Texas towns....even fiction should not be written this outrageous!  I guess everyone remembers details in their own way!  I have to say, it was entertaining trying to figure out who each character was supposed in real life!
